body:
The previous code didn't have this check. Furthermore, the losses test checks that this arg is present: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/gan/python/losses/python/losses_impl_test.py#L158

How would you feel about removing this argument?
